dependencies.name: py-astroid
dependencies.description:
A common base representation of python source code for pylint and other
projects.

dependencies.name: py-isort
dependencies.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependencies.name: py-mccabe
dependencies.description: Ned's script to check McCabe complexity.

dependencies.name: py-editdistance
dependencies.description: Fast implementation of the edit distance (Levenshtein distance).

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-configparser
dependencies.description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependencies.name: py-singledispatch
dependencies.description: This library brings functools.singledispatch to Python 2.6-3.3.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.
